component.name: Focal
component.summary: Organize tasks and notes in a tree structure for focus and productivity.

description.p: Focal helps you manage your notes and tasks in an organized and intuitive way. Using a unique tree-based structure, it allows you to keep your thoughts and projects clear and accessible.
🌳 Tree Structure Organize notes and tasks hierarchically, making it simple to navigate and manage information.
📝 Versatile Note Types Create notes, tasks, kanban boards, or dynamic filters to fit your workflow.
🔍 Powerful Search Quickly locate notes and tasks within your tree structure.
🏷️ Tagging System Use tags to categorize and filter your notes and tasks efficiently.
💬 Comments on Notes Add comments to notes to record changes or additional details.
✏️ Rich and Normal Text Editors Choose between rich text formatting and a plain text editor to suit your needs.
🎨 Customizable Options Tailor Focal to match your workflow with adjustable settings.

Why Focal? Focal’s intuitive design and customizable features make it a practical tool for organizing your tasks and ideas. It’s designed to work the way you do, offering flexibility without complexity.
Download Focal Today Take the first step toward better organization. Start using Focal to structure your thoughts and tasks!
